'''Ron Bottitta''' is an English actor. He is known for his roles in the television series ''Boston Public'', ''The Shield'', ''Alias'', ''Lost'', ''Law & Order: LA'' and ''Grey's Anatomy'' and his in the films ''A Lot Like Love'', ''A Christmas Carol'', ''Transformers: Dark of the Moon'' and ''47 Ronin''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]'', he voices [[Harys]], a Whitehill soldier and a Lannister soldier.
